text:
I recently purchased an RF racket from Rackethaus, and I couldn't be happier with the experience. Jo and Jason were absolutely fantastic — knowledgeable, friendly, and genuinely passionate about helping me find the perfect setup. They took the time to understand my game and recommended strings that felt amazing on the court. The tension they suggested was spot on, giving me the perfect balance of control and power.

Their expertise really made all the difference, and it's clear they care about getting it right for each customer.

Definitely one of my go to place for my tennis needs. Jason, fad and team were friendly and knowledgeable about the products the store carries. Had a great chat with them before leaving the place. I believe they do racket demo program as well, so do check them out if you're keen on getting a new stick. Thanks again for the string job, cant wait to try them.

Have been visiting them for years, and they have helped with picking out my first racket, patiently guiding me through picking the right strings, etc!

Always super friendly, and they have very good service. Will always be back!

I recently purchased a tennis racket and the experience was remarkable! Jason was knowledgeable, friendly, and helped me find the perfect racket that matched my playing style and level. He let me try out a few options and explained the differences clearly. Great customer service, fair pricing, and a solid selection. Highly recommend for anyone serious about their game!

I’ve had my racket strung by Faiz multiple times, and he never disappoint! The quality of the string job is top-notch, with perfect tension and consistency every time. He take the time to understand my playing style and recommend the best strings for my needs.

Their turnaround time is fast, and they’re always professional, friendly, and knowledgeable. My game has definitely improved thanks to their expert stringing. Highly recommend to any tennis player looking for precision and reliability!
